description.0: A silver-forged ritual vessel, pure and completely without blemish. It is said to be a sacred relic passed down for generations among the priestesses of the far north.

0.0: For 10s after a Charged Attack hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>72</cryo>. For 10s after an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>48</cryo>.

1.0: For 10s after a Charged Attack hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>90</cryo>. For 10s after an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>60</cryo>.

2.0: For 10s after a Charged Attack hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>108</cryo>. For 10s after an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>72</cryo>.

3.0: For 10s after a Charged Attack hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>126</cryo>. For 10s after an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>84</cryo>.

4.0: For 10s after a Charged Attack hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>144</cryo>. For 10s after an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>96</cryo>.
